WITH DEPT_TEAM AS ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, B.NAME,B.ID FROM( SELECT A.NAME, A.DEPT_ID, A.LEVEL_CD, A.ID, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE DEPT_ID LIKE #{deps} || '%') AS CNT FROM TB_CM06M01 A WHERE A.DEPT_ID LIKE #{deps} || '%' ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID ASC, A.LEVEL_CD DESC )B ) SELECT M.CODE_ID, M.CODE_NM, M1.CODE_ID AS CODE_VALUE, M1.CODE_NM AS CODE_ERUM , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_CM06M01 WHERE CO_CD = 'GUN' AND DEPT_ID LIKE #{deps} || '%') AS TEAM_CNT --영업팀 인원 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD = M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 1) )AS USER1 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD = M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 2) )AS USER2 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD =M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 3) )AS USER3 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD = M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 4) )AS USER4 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD =M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 5) )AS USER5 , (SELECT COUNT(T.SUB_CD) AS ITEM_CNT FROM TB_QM01P01 T WHERE 1=1 AND T.SUB_CD = M1.CODE_ID AND T.DEPT_CD = M.CODE_KIND AND T.CREAT_ID IN (SELECT ID FROM DEPT_TEAM WHERE RNUM = 6) )AS USER6 FROM TB_CM05M01 M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM05M01 M1 ON M1.CODE_KIND = M.CODE_ID AND M1.USE_YN='Y' WHERE 1=1 AND M.USE_YN='Y' AND M.CODE_KIND = #{cobgb} ORDER BY M.SORT_NO ASC

SELECT ROWNUM AS RN , A.FILE_TRGT_KEY , A.RES_NO , A.CO_CD , A.ORDRG_ID , C.NAME AS ORDRG_NM , TO_CHAR(A.RES_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RES_DT , A.RES_RMK , A.RES_DIV , A.WRITE_DT , A.WRITE_YEAR , A.WRITE_MONTH , A.CREAT_ID , A.CREAT_PGM , A.CREAT_DTTM FROM TB_QM02M01 A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_CM06M01 C ON C.ID = A.ORDRG_ID AND C.CO_CD = A.CO_CD WHERE FILE_TRGT_KEY = #{fileTrgtKey} AND ROWNUM = 1

SELECT CASE WHEN MAX(RES_NO) IS NULL THEN 'RES'||SUBSTR(#{writeDt}, 3, 2)||'00001' ELSE 'RES'||SUBSTR(#{writeDt}, 3, 2)||LPAD(TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(MAX(RES_NO), -5)) + 1, 5, 0) END AS MNGM_NO FROM TB_QM02M01 WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND RES_DT LIKE SUBSTR(#{writeDt}, 0, 4)||'%'
